dependencies.name: bison
dependencies.description:
Bison is a general-purpose parser generator that converts an annotated
context-free grammar into a deterministic LR or generalized LR (GLR)
parser employing LALR(1) parser tables.

dependencies.name: flex
dependencies.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependent_to.name: libibumad
dependent_to.description:
This package installs the user-space libraries and headers for
libibumad. This is a subset of the linux-rdma distribution.

dependent_to.name: rdma-core
dependent_to.description: RDMA core userspace libraries and daemons

dependent_to.name: powertop
dependent_to.description:
Powertop is a Linux tool to diagnose issues with power consumption and
power management

dependent_to.name: dropwatch
dependent_to.description:
Dropwatch is a project I started in an effort to improve the ability for
developers and system administrator to diagnose problems in the Linux
Networking stack, specifically in our ability to diagnose where packets
are getting dropped.

dependent_to.name: batctl
dependent_to.description: B.A.T.M.A.N. advanced control and management tool
